attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: It’s making my phone glitch ever since I downloaded it also I realized trump is an idiot

attributes.title: DONT DO IT
attributes.review: this app physically came out of my phone and ate my SANDWICH im so angry and sad because it was a turkey sandwich and then the app spit out my sandwich like it was trump. racist,rapist,sexually attracted to his daughter,sexist,and disgusting. 😡

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app made my megaladon art three sharks today and my tree got me Taco Bell instead of McDonald I’m so mad oh yeah this app makes me sick Donald trump is worthless president

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: all jokes aside this app is honestly horrible it’s constantly stealing and selling all my data and since downloading my phone just constantly buzzes for no reason i even turned notifications off, what is this????

attributes.title: it’s a scam!
attributes.review: i tried to play this game but apparently it’s political! 😹 how dare it, anyways while you’re here, how about we talk about black lives matter, sign petitions, go to protests, do everything in your power, remember; if you ignore this, you’re part of the problem!

attributes.title: Take this app down !

attributes.title: THIS GAVE ME DIARRHEA THANKS
